roleset.name: hit with a flat object
roleset.note: SLAP-V NOTES: Comparison with hit. Member of Vncls throw-17.1-1, bump-18.4-1, hit-18.1-1. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from slap.01-v)

role.descr: instrument, thing hit by or with

example.name: instrumental subject
example.text: London share prices closed sharply lower Friday in active trading after Chancellor of the Exchequer Nigel Lawson's resignation slapped the market and Wall Street's rapid initial sell-off knocked it down.
example.arg: Chancellor of the Exchequer Nigel Lawson's resignation

example.name: ARG0 and ARG2 and ARG1
example.text: Once he came very close to cutting a finger clean off with a sickle , but he just slapped some cement mix -LRB- commonly regarded as a good disinfectant -RRB- on the wound and worked on through the pain .
example.arg: some cement mix -LRB- commonly regarded as a good disinfectant -RRB-
